DOC.criteria: Meet Diagnostic Statistical Manual edition IV criterion neuropsychiatric disorder enumerate study population description Exclusionary criterion subject include : evidence clinically significant sleep disorder would cause hypersomnolence ( e.g . moderate severe obstructive sleep apnea , restless legs syndrome , shiftwork sleep disorder ) , history significant head trauma loss consciousness > 30 minute ; current smoking 15 cigarette per day ; > 3 caffeinated beverage per day ; significant neurologic medical illness ; active drug/alcohol abuse/dependence ( within 6 month enrollment ) , woman pregnant , < 6 month postpartum , nurse plan become pregnant study ; lefthandedness ( due effect sleep topography ) ; imminent risk selfharm suicide .
